message: Hi Bob, I have the product you're interested in. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $110 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $110 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $140.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product.
I'm not willing to go below $145, but I'm willing to make a compromise. I'll meet you at $135.
I'm close to your offer, but I'm still trying to stretch my budget. I'll meet you halfway between $135 and my previous offer of $130. I'll pay $132.50 for the product.
